sections.title: Dissident of Dawn (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Dissident of Dawn class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Table: Dissident of dawn (Dissident of Dawn)
sections.description: Advancement table showing the Dissident of Dawn's progression from levels 1-10, including BAB, saves, special abilities, and spell progression.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Dissident of Dawn)
sections.description: Dissident of Dawn gains no additional weapon or armor proficiencies beyond their base class.

sections.title: Divine Deception ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Dissident of Dawn)
sections.description: Grants sacred bonus to coded message checks and increases spell identification DC, plus adds illusion and concealment spells to spell list with extended duration for same faith worshipers.

sections.title: Eschew Materials (Dissident of Dawn)
sections.description: Grants Eschew Materials as bonus feat and allows ignoring divine focus components for spells.

sections.title: Secret Caster ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Dissident of Dawn)
sections.description: Allows disguising spellcasting using Bluff and Sleight of Hand checks with various penalties, increasing casting time but potentially avoiding attacks of opportunity.

sections.title: Schismatic Apostle ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Dissident of Dawn)
sections.description: Increases DC of mind-affecting effects against same faith or opposing faith followers, and enhances inquisitor judgment bonuses against these targets.

sections.title: Burning Blade (Su) (Dissident of Dawn)
sections.description: Expends channel energy or judgment to grant flaming (later flaming burst) weapon property to touched scimitars, with merciful option for same faith targets.

sections.title: Shift Blame (Su) (Dissident of Dawn)
sections.description: When provoking attacks of opportunity, can use Bluff to redirect the attack to an adjacent creature instead.

sections.title: Morning Light (Su) (Dissident of Dawn)
sections.description: Expends channel energy or judgment to grant allies new saves against ongoing conditions, with enhanced effect for same faith worshipers.

sections.title: Flight of the Phoenix (Su) (Dissident of Dawn)
sections.description: Upon death, creates flame strike effect and returns as phoenix ally before being resurrected with negative levels.
